a.title: School Closure Information
Our District
School Closure Information

nav.div: Waukegan CUSD #60 » Our District » School Closure Information

div.p: In case of deteriorating weather conditions, be sure to check the District Headlines section on the home page of our web site.
The Administration will also contact the following radio and television stations who report school closings.
